LOS ANGELES( AP)- Simon Cowell wants his new Fox talent series "The X Factor" to include controversy, vocal groups and, maybe, Paula Abdul on the judging panel. We've spoken to her, she knows I'm a big fan, Simon Cowell said of his former fellow "American Idol" judge. "I've always said at some point we are going to be working together."
